column6: "ENEMY OF THE STATE" PART 3 (OF 6) The Fantastic Four is trapped in the Baxter Building with the world's deadliest weapon... Wolverine!  Think this is as good as it gets for Wolverine?  You tell us, folks â€" all we're thinking right now is that four against one isn't a fair fight... for the Four, that is...
